mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKMST (title,BOOK_CD,b_group,publish,author,grade,borrowcheck,imageurl, rece_ymd, isbn, price, summary) VALUES (#{bookname},#{bookCode},#{genre},#{publisher},#{writer},0,0,#{imageurl}, NOW(), #{isbn}, #{priceSales}, #{summary})
